trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Chromatic Beam
entries: The derro launches a brilliant beam of magical energy in a 5-foot-wide line that is 60 feet long. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The derro casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):
